articles.title: Australia’s most decorated soldier loses multiple defamation claims against media who accused him of war crimes - CNN
articles.description: Australia’s most decorated soldier lost a multi-million dollar defamation case against three newspapers who accused him of committing war crimes in Afghanistan – including the murder of unarmed prisoners – as a judge ruled their reports met the standards of t…
